A tech executive privately funding hundreds of soldiers to fight for Ukraine
Russia’s techies flee country they fear is ‘flying into an abyss’

stories.text:
Clint Ehrlich is sharing on Twitter news about next hilarious stupidity that Russian propaganda machine has produced.

https://twitter.com/ClintEhrlich/status/1501690951323963395

Member of Russian Academy of Military Sciences -- Alexander Bartosh -- claimed America was developing gene weapons in Ukraine targeting Slavs.

That's right, Russian propaganda machine claims that United States developed a weapon specially targeting Slavic people in a Slavic country using Slavic scientists.

So they developed in Ukraine weapons that would target nations that are considered US allies like of course Ukrainians but also Poles, Slovaks, Czechs, Slovenians, Bulgarians and so on?

Yes, of course, this makes perfect sense to do that.

But in all seriousness, there is no such thing as Slavic gene. It is mostly cultural thing and people geographically close to each other share huge amount of genes. https://www.quora.com/Is-Slavic-a-genetic-or-cultural-term-Are-Eastern-Western-and-South-Slavs-the-same-blood

If you want to target Russians, you will end up targeting some Ukrainians, some Belorussians, Latvians, Estonians, Lithuanians, Poles and so on.

It is complete nonsense but this of course does not stop Russian propaganda machine to produce and spread it and it stops even less its gullible followers to swallow it, believe it and spread it even further.
